MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK2 postcode area Falkirk. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.30pm to repair a damaged underground cable on Jarvie Road caused by third party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.40pm on Monday 12th April 2021.
